backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: a photo gallery displaying 8 user photos and a personalized closing message 'forever yours with love bablet', both with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing an apology-themed application with photo gallery, romantic color scheme, and custom typography.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with CSS custom properties defining a neutral grayscale color system for light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title 'Sorry Aafu' that loads the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main apology page component featuring heartfelt message to Aafu, PhotoGallery component, and 'forever yours with love bablet' closing message with romantic styling and background image.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: Photo gallery component displaying 8 Snapchat images in a responsive grid with loading states, hover effects, and elegant styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with idle handling disabled by default.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS styles with custom OKLCH color palette for apology theme (rose, coral, peach, lavender) supporting light and dark modes, plus Playfair Display serif font configuration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette using OKLCH color space, extended theme for apology-themed colors (rose, coral, peach, lavender), custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for an emotional apology website addressed to 'aafu', documenting 5 implemented features including single-page frontend, warm visual theme, background image, photo gallery with 8 Snapchat images, and personalized message from 'bablet'.
